title: Why North Korea's nuclear program is so difficult to stop: Fmr. Amb. Chris Hill
description: Chris Hill, Former Ambassador to the Republic of Korea (South Korea) and Dean of the Josef Korbel School of International Studies at the University of Denver, joins Chuck to talk about the history behind North Korea nuclear program, and why pressuring China is the only way to solve the problem.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
